bill.title: Public construction projects; require entities to have verifiable percentage goals for veteran business participation.
bill.description: An Act To Require Public Entities To Have Verifiable Percentage Goals For Veteran Business Participation In Public Construction Projects; To Provide That Public Entities Shall Require Contractors To Make Good Faith Efforts To Meet The Veteran Business Participation; To Amend Section 31-7-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Public Entities To Set Aside A Certain Percentage Of Anticipated Annual Expenditures For The Purchase Of Commodities From Veteran Businesses; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Veterans and Military Affairs;Accountability, Efficiency, Transparency
